application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T64-66 - Crab apple - Reduce crown by approx 1-2m to contain development and limit. Trees to be left with a total height of 3-4m and a width of 2-3m shade and debris. Finished height approx 4m, width approx 3mT78 - Bay - Trim and shape to contain development, tree to left at height of 3-4m with a crown width of 3mT164-165 - liquidambers - reduce crown by approx 2-3m to contain development and limit shade and debris. Tree will be left at a crown height of 4m and a 2m crown width, Finished height approx 4-5m, width approx 2mT201-200 - Pear - reduce crown by approx 2-3m to contain development and limit shade and debris. tree will be left at a total crown height of 3m and a width of 2m, Finished height approx 4m, width approx 2-3mT184-186 - Cherry - reduce crown by approx 2-3m to contain development and limit shade and debris. trees will be left at a total crown height of 5m and a width of 3m, Finished height approx 6m, width approx 3-4mT221 + 220 Liquid amber x2 - Reduce by approx 2m and thin reminder to limit shade and debris, Finished height approx 4-5m, width approx 2-3mT209-211 Cherry x3 - Reduce by approx 2-3 to contain development and limit shade and debris, Finished height approx 4-5m, width approx 2-3mT152-165 Liquid Ambers and Pear trees - Reduce by approx 2m to contain development and limit shade and debris, Finished height approx 4-5m, width approx 2-3mT198-203 Pear x 6 - Reduce by approx 2-3m to contain development and limit shade and debris, Finished height approx 4m, width approx 2-3mT166-171 Magnolia - Reduce crown to most recent points, approx 2-3m reduction. Finished height approx 4-5m, width approx 3-4mT106-107 Bay Tree - Reduce height by approx 3-4m, lift over pavement to 2.5m and trim remainder. Finished height approx 5-6m, width approx 4-5m
